TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3828=Sons of Anarchy, a television drama series created by Kurt Sutter, premiered on September 3, 2008 on the cable network FX in the United States. The series concluded on December 9, 2014,[1] after 92 episodes broadcast over seven seasons.}
